org.anyframe.generic.dao.query
Class QueryDaoUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.anyframe.generic.dao.query.QueryDaoUtil

public final class QueryDaoUtil
extends Object

General QueryService Utilities class with rules for primary keys. The original code of this class comes from Appfuse framework.

Author:
Bobby Diaz, Bryan Noll, modified by SooYeon Park
